snippet.title: MechWarrior 2 Ghost Bear's Legacy intro
snippet.description: Intro cinematic for MechWarrior 2: Ghost Bear's Legacy.  A Ghost Bear Kodiak ambushes a Smoke Jaguar Mad Dog on patrol.
